Subskills.name: Splinters
Subskills.description: Trunks have a chance to explode into multiple splinters inflicting monsters hit with bleeding for a portion of the damage.

Subskills.name: Stack of Trunks
Subskills.description: Cut down multiple trees in an arc.

Subskills.name: Heavy Trunk
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to stunned targets.

Subskills.name: Sequoia
Subskills.description: Increases the size of tree trunks.

Subskills.name: Sticking Splinters
Subskills.description: Splinters stick to monsters on hit dealing damage over time.

Subskills.name: Skillfull Fall
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by tree trunk triumph.

Subskills.name: Sudden Treefall
Subskills.description: Trunks have a chance to cut down another tree at a nearby enemy.

Subskills.name: Falling Forest
Subskills.description: Multiple trunks fall from the sky on target location, falling towards the nearest monster. Tree trunk triumph now has a cooldown.

Subskills.name: Heavy Fall
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to unleash a shockwave in the falling direction, dealing additional damage.

Subskills.name: Clear The Way
Subskills.description: Decreases movement diminish when using tree trunk triumph.

Subskills.name: Giant Red Tree
Subskills.description: Every third attack summons a gigantic trunk dealing increased damage and inflicting armor break on hit.

Subskills.name: Splitting Fall
Subskills.description: Trunks split into multiple wooden discs upon falling that chain from monsters on hit.
